entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json.Deserialize System.Net.Mail; #76798
  • System.Text.Json Serializer ignores JsonIgnore when generating JsonTypeInfo #76794
  • Make distributed transactions code trimmable (on Windows) #76791
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allocate blittable objects on stack memory #76787

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: add global await #76789
  • CoreCLR failed to build with error Failed to retrieve information about 'Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk' on MSVC #76776

PullRequests

Created

  • Combine AsSpan().Slice(...) calls into AsSpan(...) #76799
    area-Meta
  • Base64.Decode: fixed latent bug for non-ASCII inputs #76795
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Split out call importation into new importercalls.cpp #76792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Slightly relax "const vector propagation" heuristics #76788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger behavior when the type has ToString method overridden #76780
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove more PAL exports for `wprintf` `wscanf` funcs #76771
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Order{Descending} for primitives #76733
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test Only - Less aggressive instrumentation for Vector256 crash #76701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correct error messages for CoreCLR Win32 PAL uses in CoreLib #76768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix help formatting in cg2/ilc #76772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Codelens wrongly count multiple file-local types up from multiple files whose names are same #64592

PullRequests

Created

  • Change operator when negating relational patterns with numeric values #64594
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix symbol colpletions after required keyword #64593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64590
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json_netty #44434
  • Blazor: Skip the initial validation for dynamically added form content #44433
  • QuickGrid Template Column with button click refreshes from database on every click when filtered. #44432
  • ASP.Net Core 6 SignInManager PasswordSignInAsync throws provider null exception #44431
  • Problem with Virtualize and EF core #44430

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, json_actix #44410
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #44418
  • Blazor API route issue with a parameter named {Action} #44422

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2015641 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-09

Issues

Updated

  • createdump fails with "[createdump] ERROR: ReadMemory(0x562aef77e040, 38) phdr FAILED" #3445

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add service manager and reflection based service discovery #3448

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • resource raw/my_ca not found #10580
  • Compiling as DLL with ApplicationDisplayVersion higher than 1.0 fails #10579
  • Memory leak while repeatedly navigating between pages #10578
  • Filepicker crashes with error "Value does not fall within the expected range" on Windows (10) when the app is distributed as exe #10577
  • Windows Publish failing with WindowsPackageType is set to None, but PublishAppxPackage is set to true. #10576
  • Android skia canvas.DrawImage has no effect with SkiaBitmapExportContext #10575
  • InvalidProgramException when using Z.EntityFramework.Extensions.EFCore library in Android and IOS #10574
  • Titlebar Translucent Issue When Switching the Root to Shell #10573
  • iOS and Android AppIcon generate icons with different sizes. #10572
  • Cannot run windows project after update #10571

PullRequests

Updated

  • Validate authenticity of compatibility renderer #10567
  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10532
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplify configuration for temporal tables with owned types #29303
  • EFCore cannot get new value in docker, if use rsync replace sqlite file #29302
  • Update SqlClient from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 #29301
